Name: Cowboys, Vampires, Pirates & Ghosts
About the game: You are a vampire girl and you go to school. Your classmates are cowboys, vampires, pirates, and ghosts. Your character has stats: health, hunger, thirst, energy, bladder, and hygiene. Please keep them in a good state: if you are hungry, eat some food, if you are thirsty d drink some beverages; if your hygiene is low, wash your hands; if you low on energy, sleep. You have to collect smiles. Almost every activity spawn smiles, also you can watch TV, visit museums, play arcades or go to a fast-food restaurant. If your stats are below some particular level or your grades at school are bad, your smiley's score will slowly go down until you fix your stat. This is a small life sim game. I hope it will give you some fun time.
